Type.Name: ThreadPool

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ThreadPool extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Provides access to the pool of threads created dynamically by the runtime environment.
Docs.remarks: Via ThreadPool, currently unused threads can be ordered to execute a function or procedure.
